title: Is there an outdoor shooting range in Wilmington? I drove by the Alvin Page firing range on US 421 today and would like to know if it is for public use or only used by public safety officers? Thanks for any suggestions.
text:
Here's a link to the answer to your question.



http://www.myreporter.com/?p=1158



Alvin Page is the New Hanover County Sheriff's Office range.
Wilmington Police Department has its own range off of River Road.
